example.name: all args
example.text: [Mr. Jobs]-1 moved *trace*-1 to remedy a couple of his computer's drawbacks yesterday by lowering the entry-level price for a Next machine by $1,500, or 23%, if the buyer chooses a hard-disk drive as an alternative to Next's optical-storage device.
example.arg: a couple of his computer's drawbacks
by lowering the entry-level price for a Next machine by $1,500, or 23%, if the buyer chooses a hard-disk drive as an alternative to Next's optical-storage device

predicate.note: Frames file for 'remedy' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.
